https://tmrev.io/movie/16516-Clannad 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/crJYdKEriRiyimMr5TUHxNW0XP5.jpg Clannad is set in a high-school located in some Japanese town. Okazaki Tomoya is a third-year student who doesn't take his studies seriously. Always late for class, he's seen as a delinquent by the rest of his classmates who are busy preparing for their entrance examinations. Needless to say, he hasn't too many close friends either. Clannad
